remarks: Equivalent expressions for a restriction of the function operation map. Unlike ` oF R ` which is a proper class, ` ( oF R | `` ( A X. B ) ) ` can be a set by ~ ofmresex , allowing it to be used as a function or structure argument.  By ~ ofmresval , the restricted operation map values are the same as the original values, allowing theorems for ` oF R ` to be reused.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ofmres $p |- ( oF R |` ( A X. B ) ) = ( f e. A , g e. B |-> ( f oF R g ) ) $.
$d A f g $.
$d B f g $.
$d R f g $.
